name: MAVERLINN
overview:
MAVERLINN specializes in accelerating industry leaders through M&A

Maverlinn is a leading European investment banking and investment management firm committed to helping its clients - corporations, financial institutions, private equity funds, governments and wealthy individuals achieve their strategic and financial goals.

Maverlinn has a special expertise in executing cross-border transactions. Key to our success is our capacity to operate seamlessly in all major financial centres in Europe and other financial centres around the world : we operate across business and geographical borders, cultures and time zones every day.

Whether advising on a multi-billion Euro LBO or a â‚¬50 million divestiture, Maverlinn brings superior innovation, expertise and execution capabilities to its clients around the world.
